title: Orianna > urgot
body: Best discovery I'VE ever made. Got back into League a couple of weeks ago and yesterday played Orianna support. This probably isn't new information but I discovered Orianna can cancel Urgot's ult. My skype commentary was probably just as amazing.

replies.body: you mean using her ult just before he ults you? thats a displacement ability, its supposed to happen. wish there were more ori supports
Like. Urgot activates his ult on my adc and I ult urgot before the swap happens.
oh right on your adc, derp, if you can time it fast enough good shit m8
It really was good shit. I lost my mind when I found out. I was like. Fk it. Picking Orianna erytime against Urgot.
Yep cause urgot picks for ADC are all the rage.
